text: We can have six modes of locks in multiple granularities: Intention-Shared, Intention-Exclusive, Shared, Shared-Intention-Exclusive, Exclusive-Intension-Shared, Exclusive. Which one of the following modes of lock has no meaning? (@) Exclusive-Intension-Shared (b) Intension-Exclusive (0) Intension-Shared (d) Shared-Intension-Exclusive
